title: How far does that ferris wheel roll?
text:
Footnotes

Sidenote: Neal Grantham has a cool Shiny app to browse previous submissions.↩︎
Perceptive readers may have noticed that this is just the diameter of the wheel. But, doesn’t that sound much less exciting?↩︎

title: Tidy Tuesday Posts
text:
On this site I will keep my #TidyTuesday visualizations, and sometimes blog posts that go into detail on creating them.
2022-08-09: Look how big those (ferris) wheels are
